name: On The Roll (Allshar)
description:
Submission for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.
Made in Unreal Engine 5.

Roll the dice to place it on the target while matching the value.

Instructions:
WASD to move 
R to restart

Credits: 
Design, programming, "art"  - Jan "Allshar" Czarniecki

Third Party Assets: 
Sounds - "Retro 8Bit Sounds" (UE Marketplace) 
Input Icons & Font - Kenney.nl
